allow: Bash(do echo "Testing $ip:8000" timeout 3 curl -s -X POST "http://$ip:8000/api/v1/users/register" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{""""installation_id"""":""""test""""}')

Bash(cmd.exe /c "echo worker_processes  1; > D:\wsl-proxy-nginx
ginx.conf && echo events { worker_connections 1024; } >> D:\wsl-proxy-nginx
ginx.conf && echo http { >> D:\wsl-proxy-nginx
ginx.conf && echo   sendfile on; >> D:\wsl-proxy-nginx
ginx.conf && echo   proxy_http_version 1.1; >> D:\wsl-proxy-nginx
ginx.conf && echo. >> D:\wsl-proxy-nginx
ginx.conf && echo   upstream app { >> D:\wsl-proxy-nginx
ginx.conf && echo     server host.docker.internal:80; >> D:\wsl-proxy-nginx
ginx.conf && echo   } >> D:\wsl-proxy-nginx
ginx.conf && echo. >> D:\wsl-proxy-nginx
ginx.conf && echo   server { >> D:\wsl-proxy-nginx
ginx.conf && echo     listen 80; >> D:\wsl-proxy-nginx
ginx.conf && echo     location / { >> D:\wsl-proxy-nginx
ginx.conf && echo       proxy_pass http://app; >> D:\wsl-proxy-nginx
ginx.conf && echo       proxy_set_header Host $host; >> D:\wsl-proxy-nginx
ginx.conf && echo       proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr; >> D:\wsl-proxy-nginx
ginx.conf && echo       proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for; >> D:\wsl-proxy-nginx
ginx.conf && echo       proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme; >> D:\wsl-proxy-nginx
ginx.conf && echo     } >> D:\wsl-proxy-nginx
ginx.conf && echo   } >> D:\wsl-proxy-nginx
ginx.conf && echo } >> D:\wsl-proxy-nginx
ginx.conf")
